questions.questionText: Find the odd one out: Apple, Banana, Mango, Potato
questions.explanation: Apple, Banana, and Mango are fruits. Potato is a vegetable. Therefore, Potato is the odd one out.
2, 3, and 5 are prime numbers. 9 is a composite number (9 = 3 Ã— 3). Therefore, 9 is the odd one out.

questions.questionText: Find the odd one out: A, E, I, P
questions.explanation: A, E, and I are vowels. P is a consonant. Therefore, P is the odd one out.
